page.title: 05TOURISM NEAR BUDE
page.content: The holiday season is shorter in this area than in many other parts of Cornwall.This is partly due to the area's remoteness. The season gets underway at Easter but the main season is between June and August. In this area there are 2 main caravan sites- at Maer and Stibb, although farms usually take in tourists as well e.g. Killock Farm has 2 static caravans.Most people come for the unspoilt beaches and countryside. The Maer site is called Bude Holiday Park and has 127{caravans}and several fields for{camping.}The facilities include a club house, shop, launderette,swimming pool, and children's play area. The site is 20 years old and is located on a private lane which has ramps to slow traffic down.
